title: PAYDAY 2 Online Client (Auto Updater)
description:
PAYDAY 2 Online Client

Features:
- Update Delivery System, never worry about updates again
- No configuration
- Zero hassle, 100% tested and working
- Works through routers and NATs, no port forwarding required
- Online Lobby for support and chat

...

Install this to your game folder. No cracks or other fixes required.

This client works for all game versions from 1.3.0 (Update 20) to newer. After installing this you never have to worry about updating again. 
Automatic updates are added as soon FTS releases them. Also it requires you to use latest update when playing online, so everyone will be automatically on the same version.
Works through routers / NATs. No Steam required. No registration required. Just install and Play !

Works online / offline. Zero hassle, 100% working. Compatible with saves from SmartSteamEmu (also known as LAN FIXV2 in some communities)
